Class Solver

java.lang.Object
sudoku.Solver
public class Solver extends Object
Backtracking Sudoku solver with solution counting.

Usage pattern:

  1. Call countSolutions(Board, int) with a limit of 2 to classify as unsolvable (0), unique (1), or multiple (≥2).
  2. If unique, call solveBoard(Board) to cache a solved copy for hints/checks.
  3. Read status via getNumSolutions() and consult the cached grid via getSolvedBoardCopy() or a cell accessor.
All solving operates on copies; the caller's board is never mutated.

  • Method Details

    • solvedValueAt

      public static int solvedValueAt(int r, int c)
      Get the solved value at (r,c) from the cached unique solution.
      Parameters:
      r - row 0..SIZE-1
      c - col 0..SIZE-1
      Returns:
      digit 1..SIZE at (r,c) in the cached unique solution
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no unique solution is cached

    • solve

      public static boolean solve(Board board)
      Solve a board in place (backtracking).

      This method mutates its argument; callers should pass a copy.

      Parameters:
      board - working board to solve
      Returns:
      true if a solution was found

    • solveBoard

      public static void solveBoard(Board original)
      Decide uniqueness by counting up to a limit (usually 2), and if exactly one solution exists, cache a solved copy internally.

      This method does not mutate original and does not change getNumSolutions() itself; that value is set by countSolutions(Board, int).

      Parameters:
      original - starting puzzle (not mutated)

    • isSolvable

      public static boolean isSolvable()
      Returns whether or not the algorithm was able to solve the board.
      Returns:
      true is a singular solution has been found and stored.

    • getNumSolutions

      public static int getNumSolutions()
      Get's the number of solutions found.
      Returns:
      the number of solutions found by the most recent analysis (0 = unsolvable, 1 = unique, â‰¥2 = multiple)

    • getSolvedBoardCopy

      public static Board getSolvedBoardCopy()
      Gets the solved board if one exists.
      Returns:
      a defensive copy of the cached solved board if one exists (unique case), otherwise null
